subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jane Forbes Clark, the chairwoman of the Baseball Hall of Fame, is at the “top of the pyramid” when it comes to influence in Cooperstown and at the Hall, which her grandfather founded in 1936.
snippet: Jane Forbes Clark, the chairwoman of the Baseball Hall of Fame, is at the “top of the pyramid” when it comes to influence in Cooperstown and at the Hall, which her grandfather founded in 1936.
